Results
Coreference Results
We outperform previous systems in all metrics .

our 5 - model ensemble.from sentence: In particular , our single model improves the state - of - the - art average F1 by 1.5 , and our 5 - model ensemble improves it by 3.1 .

most significant gains.from sentence: The most significant gains come from improvements in recall , which is likely due to our end - toend setup .
